title: I thought PBE was supposed to filter toxicity ?
body:
So I've decided to join a 5v5 normal game in PBE to try out ryze.
Champion select goes well, everyone picks their lanes, and we proceed into the game.
I've fed first blood against Draven mid, and after Draven getting ganked a few times by Skarner even though he did not die, he decided to write in all chat that we suck.
I swiped that off, and continued to play the game.
Afterwards, when I was feeding hard even though not intentionally, our Fiora and Lucian started flaming me and saying that i'm bronze, that they are gonna report me for feeding, etc... , and she kept pointing out my score and how bad it is.
also enemy Jax got a bit ahead of himself and kept asking when we would ff and after the game ended he said in lobby gg ez.
So the only thing that was on my mind the whole game was:"Isn't PBE supposed to be a friendly beta-testing environment?"
Honestly I know that /mute all exists but I am playing in PBE to test out my champion along with my team mates and hopefully get tips too on how to play him better and pick fun champion picks that work together, But to think people would go that low in a PBE Match to the point where they want to report me for feeding and start verbally abusing me?
This whole post is just my point of view on the current state of the PBE environment, and how I was disappointed.

replies.body: I'm not sure why you expected anything else out of the public butthurt environment, but there'll always be a significant presence of salty tryhard players in the test servers. There are always salty sailors in those sorts of places, and League's beta server is no exception.
How come you kept feeding?  Didn't you realize you were hurting your team and you should stop ?

Also, I've checked your recent match history, and how dare you say that phrase to me, when you yourself can't even pursue it with your 5 games in a row loss with Illaoi support, going 0/7 twice in a row.

You do realize that when you play in the PBE you have a really slow ping, and when you play Mage champions unlike auto attack champions, 
Casting spells and doing combos is way harder then it is usually.
Then again, I said that I didn't feed intentionally, and going AFK to stop feeding isn't a solution for me either.
The phrase of "Stop feeding" is the most invidious phrase any one can say to a player that is actually trying.
I am here to play and  try out Ryze, not to try to score a good score in a god damn PBE match.
